messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I got a nifty-keen Gym Badge from
the Gym Leader in Oreburgh City!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’m collecting lots of Gym Badges.
They’re so sparkly and pretty!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I got a nifty-keen Gym Badge from
the Gym Leader in Oreburgh City!...Did I show you already?
